value.title: StarCraft 2: herO builds 22(!) Gateways vs ByuN! (Best-of-5)
value.excerpt: Best-of-5 series of professional StarCraft 2 between herO (Protoss) and ByuN (Terran). This series is the Grand Finals of the ESL Open Cup 153 America and showcases a lot of unorthodox buildorders.
